title: PFL 2019, Playoffs 2 live results
text:
The PFL is back in action with their second playoff event of 2019.

Thursday night, the lightweights and featherweights take center stage at the Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas.

The evening will begin with quarterfinal-round fights, then the winners will square off in semifinal bouts later in the evening.

From there, the finalists advance to the PFL 2019 Championship, which takes place Dec. 31, where playoff winners will take home $1 million prizes.

Both divisions feature competitors who will look to defend their 2018 crowns: Natan Schulte at lightweight and Lance Palmer at featherweight.

MAIN CARD (ESPN+, 10:30 p.m. ET):

PRELIMINARY CARD (ESPN 2, 8 p.m. ET):
description: Follow along live as quarterfinal and semifinal matchups are held in the lightweight and featherweight divisions.
